answers.answer: I found out my hour GD test was high so I just took my 3hour test yesterday so I guess I will find out next week but I was freaking out now I'm like u know what I don't mind I will try to control it but eating right and trying to exercise and pray me and the baby will be ok

Ive had it 2x out of im on preg#9 but 7th baby anyways the first time my sugar was out of control i was on insulin i seen a dietician and i ate alot because if i did not my sugar would go too low and i felt sick . the 2nd time i controlled it with diet and i did have sweets every one in awhile but no juice and not too many fruits it's managable.
Omg I love fruits that's all I snack on I don't do to much sweets or juice but I am a sucker for fruits.......

question: So today I found out ive got gestational diabetes and to be honest the news has shocked me I cant enjoy things I like or crave theres not a lot I can eat that I enjoy due to sugars I just wanna know im not goin thru this alone and wondering how people in my situation have coped xxx
